Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1988...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/18/1989, off Kurt Kepshire (PHI)...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 9/7/1989...
Injured on 7/20/1990 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Injured on 8/13/1991 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/22/1991 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1992...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1993...
Injured on 6/15/1994 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 8/11/1994 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Released by Atlanta on 8/22/1994...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 8/22/1994 to a 1-year deal worth $1,416,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1996, hitting .323 with 8 HR, 23 RBI...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1997, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1997, hitting .474 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
